description:
The reality gameshow craze reaches out to touch our world weary travellers. Vincent goes head to head in a fatal face off with a host who knows much more than he should.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ki Akumu no Quiz Show! Who Wants to Be in Jeopardy!
Nightmare Quiz Show! Who Wants to Be in Jeopardy!
O quiz show pesadelo - Ninguém quer estar em sabatina
Who wants to be in Jeopardy!
Адская викторина - Кто хочет стать миллионером?
生悪夢のクイズSHOW! WHO WANTS TO BE IN JEOPARDY!
